title: Installation and safety requirements for photovoltaic (PV) arrays

scope.maximum_pv_array_power_limit: CHANGED - scope modified regarding maximum PV array power limit
scope.dc_conditioning_units: NEW - provisions relating to d.c. conditioning units
scope.voltage_current_calculations: NEW - voltage and current calculations for DC conditioning systems

key_changes_2021.changes: Modified requirements for overcurrent protection and earthing methods
key_changes_2021.impact: Updated protection schemes and earthing requirements

key_changes_2021.changes: Updated methods of PV isolation including d.c conditioning units
key_changes_2021.impact: Enhanced isolation procedures for maintenance and emergency situations

key_changes_2021.changes: Updated requirements for wiring systems and revised connector requirements
key_changes_2021.impact: New connector specifications and wiring installation standards

key_changes_2021.changes: New signs, verification and commissioning requirements

dc_systems.primary_hazard: Ability to produce and sustain electrical arcs with currents at normal operating levels
dc_systems.arc_detection: Limited standards available at publication time
dc_systems.future_requirements: Standard will be revised to require arc detection technology as standards develop

related_standards.title: Grid connection of energy systems via inverters
International Standard for inverters
related_standards.relationship: Required by both AS/NZS 5033 and 4777 for grid-connected PV

related_standards.title: Wiring Rules
related_standards.relationship: Electrical installation framework for PV systems

technical_committee.title: Renewable Energy Power Supply Systems and Equipment
technical_committee.type: Joint Standards Australia/Standards New Zealand Committee
key_organizations: Australasian Fire and Emergency Service Authorities Council

regulatory_notes.implementation_timing: Regulatory authorities may apply requirements at different times than publication date
regulatory_notes.user_requirements: Must consult regulatory authorities to confirm their specific requirements
regulatory_notes.legal_framework: Standards Australia Limited/Crown of New Zealand 2021 - no reproduction without written permission

next_steps: Extract detailed technical requirements from all 142 pages
Identify specific safety procedures and installation requirements
Map voltage/current calculation requirements for DC conditioning units
Extract new connector and wiring specifications
Document updated isolation methods and procedures
Integrate with Victoria Electricity Safety Regulations 2019
Update solar compliance engine with AS/NZS 5033:2021 specific checks
Prepare system for future arc detection requirements
